info.title: Parcha API
info.description: API to deploy Parcha AI Agents

get.description:
Get Job by ID

This API endpoint retrieves a job by its ID.

Args:
    jobId (str): The ID of the job to retrieve.

Returns:
    JSONResponse: A JSON object containing the job details if found, else None.

post.description:
Run KYB Agent Job

This API endpoint starts a job from a specified KYB agent with a command to be executed.

Args:
    kyb_schema (ParchaKYBSchema): The model containing the KYB agent key, command, and optional payload.
        It should be an instance of ParchaKYBSchema with the following fields:
        - id (str): The Case ID for the KYB check.
        - self_attested_data: the self-attested information for the business.
    agent-key (str): The key of the agent that will execute the command.
Returns:
    JobIdResponse: A response object containing the status and job ID.

Run  Agent Job

This API endpoint starts a job from a specified agent config with a command to be executed.

Args:
    kyb_schema (ParchaKYBSchema): The model containing the KYB agent key, command, and optional payload.
        It should be an instance of ParchaKYBSchema with the following fields:
        - id (str): The Case ID for the KYB check.
        - self_attested_data: the self-attested information for the business.
    config (json): The configuration of the agent.
Returns:
    JobIdResponse: A response object containing the status and job ID.

get.summary: Get Agent Job By Case Id

schema.title: Response Get Agent Job By Case Id Api V1 Getagentjobbycaseid Get
